summary: A suite of auxiliary utilities that underpin the Deep Graph Library (DGL), covering validation of devices and IDs, conversion of diverse graph data formats to tensors, exception propagation across threads, ID set filtering, internal lightweight data structures, and pinned‑memory tensor handling for efficient I/O.
business_intent: Enable reliable, high‑performance graph processing in DGL by abstracting common checks, data transformations, error handling, and memory optimizations, thereby simplifying development of graph neural network applications.
